data.name: FLASHOUT 3
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1105330
https://store.steampowered.com/app/860620
https://store.steampowered.com/app/990030


OUR STRATEGY GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1541790
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287000
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248060


About the Game

FLASHOUT IS BACK!





Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. This is where the world of FLASHOUT 3 will take you and your ride to the absolute limits!



FLASHOUT 3 offers you ultra-fast ships, loops, jumps and sudden razor-sharp turns! Test your skills on the most impressive sci-fi racing tracks and try not to fall behind! But if it happens, don't sweat! Unleash the power of rockets, guns, bombs and mines to help you level down your competition!

Take part in an exciting, head-to-head fight to the finish! Witness spectacular crashes, the agony of defeat, and the sweet taste of victory! But don't blink! It can all end in a flash!

Features:



  • High-speed, unforgettable racing experience.
  • A powerful arsenal of weapons, boosts and upgrades at your disposal.
  • A large collection of destroyable race ships to choose from.
  • A variety of different race tracks and layouts.
  • Various game modes, including Career, Versus and more!
  • Stunning 3D Graphics.
  • High-beat electronic music.

Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. Take part in an exciting, head-to-head fight to the finish!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.14 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 4 thread or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 chip or GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.14 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 4 thread or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 chip or GeForce RTX 2070 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 or equivalent with 4 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
